info.title: Shyft V1
info.description: This API collection will enable you to speed up your web3 development on Solana.

get.description: lets you check the balance in your solana wallet

post.description: allows you to transfer SOL from your account to another.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token address whose balance you want to fetch

post.description: Mints an NFT into a wallet corresponding to the private key on blockchain. Wallet's public address is set as the update authority.

external_url.description: any url to associate with the NFT

file.description: Image/pdf/.doc or any file that you would want to turn into nft

max_supply.description: Maximum number of clones/edition mints possible for this NFT

royalty.description: represents how much percentage of secondary sales does the original creator gets. Ranges from (0-100), 0 being original creator gets nothing and 100 being original creator gets entire amount from secondary sales

post.description: updates the properties and data associated to the nft

external_url.description: any url to associate with the NFT

file.description: digital file that nft represents (image/doc/video etc)

royalty.description: represents how much percentage of secondary sales does the original creator gets. Ranges from (0-100), 0 being original creator gets nothing and 100 being original creator gets entire amount from secondary sales

token_address.description: address of the NFT to be updated

update_authority.description: address of the update_authority of the NFT to be updated

get.description: Read all the nfts from a wallet, or optionally all nfts with a paricular update_authority from a wallet

get.description: Get the properties, metadata and on-chain parameters of an already existing on-chian nft.

post.description: Upload and store file on IPFS decentralized data storage.

file.description: Image/video/document or any file that you want to upload and store on IPFS decentralized storage.

post.description: This is the first API that you need to use and generate the `x-api-key`, used in the header for authentication of other api calls in this collection.

message.example: API key sent successfully to your email.

value.message: API key sent successfully to your email.

tags.name: Wallet
tags.description: This directory has the basic APIs to check account balance and transfer SOL to another account.

tags.name: NFTs
tags.description: This directory as all the APIs that you need to realise your NFT dapps

tags.name: Storage
tags.description: This directory gives you apis that allows you to explicitly create and store data on decentralized ipfs storage.
